paragraphs.name: 0d20
paragraphs.text: Americans want to see Trump’s tax returns. We’re all curious how much business with the Russians Trump has been doing for the last 20 years. After all, when the banks wouldn’t loan money to Trump after his bankruptcies and the collapse of his casinos, Trump, his families and his friends suddenly seem to be doing a lot of business with Russians.
